title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
writers: Leigh Brackett, Lawrence Kasdan, George Lucas
actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins his Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued across the galaxy by Darth Vader and bounty hunter Boba Fett.

title: The Matrix
writers: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
actors: Keanu Reeves, Laurence Fishburne, Carrie-Anne Moss
shortDescription: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth--the life he knows is the elaborate deception of an evil cyber-intelligence.

title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
writers: George Lucas
actors: Mark Hamill, Harrison Ford, Carrie Fisher
shortDescription: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.

title: Back to the Future
writers: Robert Zemeckis, Bob Gale
actors: Michael J. Fox, Christopher Lloyd, Lea Thompson
shortDescription: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the maverick scientist Doc Brown.

title: Alien
writers: Dan O'Bannon, Ronald Shusett
actors: Sigourney Weaver, Tom Skerritt, John Hurt
shortDescription: The crew of a commercial spacecraft encounter a deadly lifeform after investigating an unknown transmission.

title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
writers: Lawrence Kasdan, George Lucas, Philip Kaufman
actors: Harrison Ford, Karen Allen, Paul Freeman
shortDescription: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.

title: Blade Runner
writers: Hampton Fancher, David Webb Peoples, Philip K. Dick
actors: Harrison Ford, Rutger Hauer, Sean Young
shortDescription: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space and have returned to Earth to find their creator.

title: The Terminator
writers: James Cameron, Gale Anne Hurd, William Wisher
actors: Arnold Schwarzenegger, Linda Hamilton, Michael Biehn
shortDescription: A human soldier is sent from 2029 to 1984 to stop an almost indestructible cyborg killing machine, sent from the same year, which has been programmed to execute a young woman whose unborn son is the key to humanity's future salvation.

title: The Princess Bride
writers: William Goldman
actors: Cary Elwes, Mandy Patinkin, Robin Wright
shortDescription: A bedridden boy's grandfather reads him the story of a farmboy-turned-pirate who encounters numerous obstacles, enemies, and allies in his quest to be reunited with his true love.

title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
writers: Gene Roddenberry, Jack B. Sowards, Harve Bennett
actors: William Shatner, Leonard Nimoy, DeForest Kelley
shortDescription: With the assistance of the Enterprise crew, Admiral Kirk must stop an old nemesis, Khan Noonien Singh, from using the life-generating Genesis Device as the ultimate weapon.

title: Inception
writers: Christopher Nolan
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Joseph Gordon-Levitt, Ellen Page
shortDescription: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal their secrets embarks on one last job to implant an idea into the mind of a CEO.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
writers: Stephen King, Frank Darabont
actors: Tim Robbins, Morgan Freeman
shortDescription: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Pulp Fiction
writers: Charlie Kaufman, Joel Coen, Quentin Tarantino
actors: Johnny Depp, Christian Bale, Morgan Freeman
shortDescription: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.

title: The Dark Knight
writers: Christopher Nolan, Aaron Sorkin, Peter Jackson
actors: Leonardo DiCaprio, Al Pacino, Tom Hanks
shortDescription: A former neo-nazi skinhead tries to prevent his younger brother from going down the same wrong path that he did.

title: Fight Club
writers: Stephen King, Quentin Tarantino, Joel Coen
actors: Morgan Freeman, Robert De Niro, Johnny Depp
shortDescription: A man creates a detailed plan to rob three Las Vegas casinos simultaneously.

title: Forrest Gump
writers: Aaron Sorkin, Peter Jackson, Charlie Kaufman
actors: Tom Hanks, Brad Pitt, Matt Damon
shortDescription: A washed-up superhero actor attempts to revive his fading career by writing, directing, and starring in a Broadway production.

title: Goodfellas
writers: Nicholas Pileggi, Martin Scorsese, Aaron Sorkin
actors: Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci
shortDescription: An undercover cop tries to take down a ruthless crime lord.

title: The Godfather
writers: Mario Puzo, Francis Ford Coppola, Aaron Sorkin
actors: Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan
shortDescription: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
writers: J.R.R. Tolkien, Fran Walsh, Philippa Boyens
actors: Elijah Wood, Viggo Mortensen, Ian McKellen
shortDescription: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
writers: J.R.R. Tolkien, Fran Walsh, Philippa Boyens
actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Orlando Bloom
shortDescription: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
writers: J.R.R. Tolkien, Fran Walsh, Philippa Boyens
actors: Elijah Wood, Ian McKellen, Viggo Mortensen
shortDescription: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of the shifty Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally, Saruman, and his hordes of Isengard.

title: Schindler's List
writers: Thomas Keneally, Steven Zaillian, Aaron Sorkin
actors: Liam Neeson, Ralph Fiennes, Ben Kingsley
shortDescription: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

title: 12 Angry Men
writers: Reginald Rose, Aaron Sorkin, Peter Jackson
actors: Henry Fonda, Lee J. Cobb, Martin Balsam
shortDescription: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
